verbs.description: Tom Leonard : [ARG2: What] [V: was] it [ARG1: that possessed Donald Trump to move the U.S. embassy in Israel from Tel Aviv to the divided city of Jerusalem , sparking this week ’s bloodshed in Gaza] ?
